title: Will it be possible to obtain enough tokens to unlock all 3 VS. icons?
body:
So far I've obtained 20 tokens per day (for the past 2 days).
Given this trend by the time the event ends (14 days total) it will only be possible to obtain 20*14 = 280 tokens. Which is the price of the border + icon. if you complete every quest every day and only complete quests for 1 side. 
So, are they going to increase the tokens rewarded for later quests? or will you have to buy a pass thingy to obtain all three icons just for one side?

replies.body: There is enough to get 2 icons, or a boarder and icon for the people who bought the skins

You can buy just tokens on their own.
I event checked the price. But if you really want th icons, its a good way to go.

But I would recommend buying the pass.
The ward skin is really nice, (at least the order one is, haven't had a good look at the other yet) and a free gemstone goes a long way.
